desc: 深淵の牢獄に囚われている魔獣の牙。

dictionary.lore: A fang from Dregamus, a massive demon locked away in a prison deep within a gorge where the sun never shines. Nothing is known of where this prison is or even who made it. However, one prominent theory is that this prison was created to hold ethereal "things," and it is said that Dregamus was among them.

name: 幽獄の牙
